description: Runs an on-demand remediation for the specified Config rules against the last known remediation configuration. It runs an execution against the current state of your resources. Remediation execution is asynchronous. You can specify up to 100 resource keys per request. An existing StartRemediationExecution call for the specified resource keys must complete before you can call the API again.

parameters.name: ConfigRuleName
parameters.description: The list of names of Config rules that you want to run remediation execution for.

parameters.name: ResourceKeys
parameters.description: A list of resource keys to be processed with the current request. Each element in the list consists of the resource type and resource ID. (dict) --- The details that identify a resource within Config, including the resource type and resource ID. The resource type. The ID of the resource (for example., sg-xxxxxx).

nested_params.name: resourceId
nested_params.description: The ID of the resource (for example., sg-xxxxxx).

nested_items.name: FailureMessage
nested_items.description: Returns a failure message. For example, the resource is already compliant.

nested_items.name: FailedItems
nested_items.description: For resources that have failed to start execution, the API returns a resource key object.

nested_items.name: resourceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the resource (for example., sg-xxxxxx).
